entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is mentioned as a person who was killed by the speaker three hours ago.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's last plan went wrong, according to Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as a person who is being addressed by Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is the speaker and is referred to as 'Riddle'.

entities.name: elder wand
entities.description: The Elder Wand is mentioned as a powerful object that is truly owned by Voldemort.

entities.name: deathstick
entities.description: The Deathstick is another name for the Elder Wand.

entities.name: wand of destiny
entities.description: The Wand of Destiny is yet another name for the Elder Wand.

relationships.description: Voldemort killed Severus Snape three hours ago, according to the speaker.
Dumbledore's last plan went wrong for Harry Potter.
The Elder Wand is truly owned by Voldemort, according to the speaker.
Harry Potter is being addressed by Voldemort.
